content.title: Infection
content.description: Infection is a condition caused by harmful microorganisms invading the body, requiring prompt diagnosis and treatment.

content.title: Sprains
content.description: Sprains involve stretched or torn ligaments, commonly affecting the ankle or wrist, and are treated with rest and support.

content.title: Burns
content.description: Burns are injuries to the skin caused by heat, chemicals, or electricity and require immediate care depending on severity.

content.title: Allergic Reactions
content.description: Allergic reactions can range from mild to life-threatening and often require urgent medical intervention to manage symptoms.

content.title: Fractures
content.description: Fractures are broken bones caused by trauma or stress and typically require imaging, stabilization, and treatment.
